title: [Wallet] Add last navigation to the specific transactions details page from toast link displayed when a community token has been received

milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team 

**1. Continue to fix bugs and stabilise chat and communities functionality as top priority**
- includes any issues found during dogfooding

**2. Status Communities / Discord bridge**
- Ensure bridge works with token gated communities (e.g. permission is set at the community level that requires a token to be held to be a member of that community)
- Ensure bridge works with token gated channels
- On the Status Desktop side, individual messages from Discord are displayed as individual messages with Discord usernames

**3. Continue work on profile showcase**

**4. Ability to mark a token gated channel as 'hidden'**
- A token gated channel that's marked as 'hidden' is only visible to community members that have the requisite tokens to access this channel
- Design for this is completed

**5. Fix user flow bugs, better handle edgecases and other improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- Banning / unbanning and kicking: graceful support of edgecases and improvements**




 

## Wallet Team

**1. Fixing bugs, stabilisation of existing functionality**
- 0.17 will be our 1st or 2nd public beta release, so squashing bugs is the top priority
- Includes fully testing Keycard on Windows and fixing any outstanding Windows Keycard issues

**2. Collectables - support graceful support of edgecases and improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues

**3. Other wallet improvements and improved edgecase support**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- QR code display updates
- Showing user which permissions they loose when they remove an account
- flow for restart required  for JSON RPC change to take effect

**4. Finish improved 'saved accounts' functionality and 'share address' dialogue**

body:
### Description
The task https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/13039 introduced toasts for:

1. Any other community [asset](https://www.figma.com/file/FkFClTCYKf83RJWoifWgoX/Wallet-v2?type=design&node-id=20765%3A399010&mode=design&t=6wvg1f2sJZXpvKwo-1) received (after first one):
![Screenshot 2024-01-19 at 12 11 46](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/97019400/aa5f2459-ae67-40fd-9bf9-c00dc8bc55a3)

2. Any other community [collectible](https://www.figma.com/file/FkFClTCYKf83RJWoifWgoX/Wallet-v2?type=design&node-id=20787%3A74778&mode=design&t=HHZUwq2iA18xbNuF-1) received (after first one):
![Screenshot 2024-01-19 at 12 11 57](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/97019400/51216368-bf01-49e6-8e3a-3f00ac0dd0aa)

Whenever the user clicks on the `View transaction details` link, it should navigate to the specific transaction details page, like this:
![Screenshot 2024-01-19 at 14 22 26](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/97019400/18b884a0-ad91-41b5-bc82-961d5e446264)

Currently it only navigates to the main activity page here:
![Screenshot 2024-01-19 at 14 22 32](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/97019400/df2bbdaf-ee79-4e4b-bbc1-32f934f43d0d)

So, the purpose of this task is to complete the navigation to the specific transaction details page.

**NOTE:** The following case is the one to be completed: `ToastsManager.qml` --> case `ToastsManager.ActionType.ViewTransactionDetails`
